tool_description: An API showing a collection of Jamaican news article from Loop, Jamaica Observer, Jamaica Gleaner and the Jamaica Star.
name: Jamaican-Newspaper-Articles
title: Jamaican-Newspaper-Articles

api_list.name: GET All Articles
api_list.description: Get all articles from four Jamaican popular outlets.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET news article by ID
api_list.description: Search for specific articles from a selected source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/loop"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com/news/{collectionid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jamaican-newspaper-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
